1.content:
You name is Nick, you had little brother named Cole. You both lived in a small house, you were staring the ceiling while you making popcorn. You sigh and take out the knife from you pocket. That knife was your father's. You press the button and summon the sharp knife.

When you were 10 years and your little brother were 6 years. Your lived great house with your parent. You had two best friend alway for you both. You both had a good life, But in 4 weeks, your parents die in car accident. Your father gave you his sharp knife and your mother gave your little brother necklace. Your father gave you a favor and said. "Promise me and your mother to protect your little brother anything in dangerous....Don't...for-forget that p-promise-a-and a-also...we love...you both.." with his last breath as he pass away even your mother do the same. Just like that. With an silence wind came by.

"M-mom...D-dad..." you shaked them.

No answer.

Mommy...Daddy..?" your little brother about to cry.

No anwser.

You both gaze of shock and scream out loud. Your little brother lean on your arm as he cried and cried. You hug him so tight. In a years later, now your age is 16 and your little brother is 11 years old. You both lived in a small house, your anut and unlce gave you both some food every 7 weeks. Your best friends come visit you both every day. You both visit your parents grave every onces a day the morning, afternoon, and night. You both miss them so much all of your hearts.

"Hey big brother?"

"Yeah?"

"I think...I think we're just like from anime shows."

"What do you mean?" you ask confusedly

"You know, FullMetal Alchamist, Naruto, and...and others too...I guess." he scretch his hair. you smile and gave him an rub hair

"Well, it's doesn't matter. Come on, Auntie is making dinner." you walk toward to the grave gate.

" 'Kay!" he get up and catch up follow you as he smile too.

End of flashback, you close your eyes and about to cry. You wanted everything was the way things were, but it's not gonna happen. "Come on big brother!! The shows about to start!" said your brother exicted. You snap out of it. You wipe off the tears. Of couse, you don't want your little brother to see crying, don't you. Cause you promise to your parents that you won't cry and protect your little brother. You grab the bag of popcorn and walk to the living room. "Okay okay, clam down little brother, I just making some popcorn" with an fake smile. "Sweet" with sweet smile on his face. You give the popcorn to your little brother, grab the remote control and press the butten. "I'm am so exicted, I can't hardly wait, big brother!!"said your little brother bounces on a couch. "Me too little brother, me too."you hug around his head. After the trailer, the opening is starting, but suddenly, the TV starts to bright as light. "What the-"you said with shock face. "Big brother I can't see Where are you?!" said your little brother with cover his eyes."Don't worry, I got you" you said to your little brother as you hold him tight as you can. The TV suck you two in hard. You try to pull your little brother, but it's too strong. The light suck you hard. You fall in portal of TV with your little brother. "Big brother, I'm scared!"said with scared with tears."Don't be scared, I won't let you go, I promise all my heart" as you hold his hand. Your little brother smile and noded with tears. Of all sudden, you feel like you been pulled and even your little brother felt it too. Also, your hand starts to holding to slip away from your little brother."Oh-no, B-Brother!!"said your little brother trying to hold your hand. You and your little brother trying to hold on each other hands tight, but your hand slip away from your little brother."Big brother!!" "Cole!!" You and your little brother reach out to each other. You lost your little brother and don't know where he is gonna go to. Will you ever see him again? You saw a brigter light. You close you eyes and fall on something hard and pass out. Then...


Whitch one would you like?
1.title: Suddenly happen

11.content:
In the middle of the night, your inside of the Ciel's mansion hallway. You walk thought the hallway and see everything is so dark that you can't bearly see. But you also need find your little brother and get the hell out of here. Sudden you hear a steps came from right in fornt of you and the candle of a light. That could be Sebastian Michaels the hell of butler that you watch every episodes. You begun to get scared and take a few steps backwards, but you fell down and gulp in fear.

"W-who're you?!" you shouted.

"Big brother?" familiar voice. That could be your little brother's voice. The person lift the candle a little bit high to see you clearly. It was your little brother. "Thank god. I thought it was that demon butler." you relief. Your little brother jump on you and hug you tight. "I'm glad your alright, big brother!!!" he shout with joy. You suddenly shhh'd him for keep it down and grab the candle from little brother's hand and said...

"Listen Cole, we're in Ciel's Phantomhive mansion." said quietly. "So that's means...we're in Black Bulter." your little brother respond. You noded. "And we need to get out of here, right now!" grab your little brother and about to run. "But...how to get out of this mansion?" You pused for a moment and think. "Um...well.." "Would you like me to help you both? " Oh, yes pleas-" you turn around and saw Sebastian with an smile, but not just a smile...an something joy smile...I guess. You crawl back as you grab your little brother. "My my, aren't you both lost? I thought I smell a rat, but I suggest I found is a two little bug." with disappointing on his face. You hold your little brother so tight to protect. "P-please don't hurt us!! I'm...I'm b-b-begging you!" you cried. Sebastian giggle and said. "Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you and your dear little brother." His eyes are glowing, his pupil into a black diamond. "Oh no, not that!!" you thought with fear. Your little brother close his eyes and hold you tight. "Make it stop, big brother!!" your little brother cried. You also hold him tight and never let go again. Just like you and your little brother suck in by the TV. You stare at him it's like....it's like he's huge. In fact, you look around inside the hallway and everything is growing. But you both are shrinking. You close your eyes and pretend it just a nightmare. Sebastian come closer to you both. "You two are perfect...for tiny slave..."

In the morning, you begun to wake up quickly and begun to sweat. You huffing and sweating. You check yourself to make sure that your okay. "What a nightmare." with an heavily sigh and wipe off the sweat of yours. "Oh, my little pet is awake." You frozen in shock and look up. "Oh-no...it's you..."
11.title: Beware of the Hell of Butler

13.content:
You wake up in goan. You look around and everything complate is white. So much white. It's like you in a heaven. "Huh? wha? Where am I?" you blink.
"Hello." an echo voice. Your eyes wide as you surprise. An strange visions guy liked like an human shapes, but it had no eyes, no nose, and no color body. He's all blank. An dark aure is around him. It appears as a pure white, nearly formless being almost indistinguishable from the rest of the endless white expanse which surrounds the Gate but for a shadowy outline which causes Truth to reflect the shape of the person it is talking to, thereby supporting its claim to be another shade of that very person. Luckly you can see him. You saw him in episode 2 and 63. You know about this God. You don't want the god know he is fiction, so you just pretend to not know about him.

"W-who're you?" you pretend ask nervously.

"Oh, I'm so glad you ask. I am so call by many names. I'm the world, I'm the universe, I'm a god, I am the true, I am all, I am one, and I am also..."You!'" he slowly point at you. You begun to confused. The door is open. Inside this huge door is all dark. An huge one eyeball suddenly appear and stare at you. In the an eye is silver and dark pupil. "If your going dare yourself to take a peek. Go ahead. The door is open and waiting for you...Nick."

"W-what do you mean and h-how did you know my name?" you concerned as you turn around to the huge flowing door in terrible sight.

"Like I said, "I am also 'you'" said God.

The many shadowy hand apear and reach to you, you scream and run to get away from it, but you got caught be shadow hands. You try to struggle, but the show hand grab you and pull you in. You grab the doors and try to pull yourself out.

"Aw, whats wrong? Are you scared? Heh, don't worry. I'll show you...the truths." said God. You struggling more you try, but the other shadowy hand grab your legs, arm, and your body. You begain to tear and the door shut.

It pull you down down in the dark as you scream. The light shine above you, these lines are some kind of time line. Everything you see was... your memories. It's like a picture, there your mom, your dad, your younger brother, your aunt, your uncle , your emo cousin , your two friends, and uncle's dog too. "IT'S TOO MUCH IT'S TOO MUCH!!! MAKE IT STOP!! PLEASE MAKE IT STOP!!" you close your eyes and hoping will be over. You feel like something is tear you apart. Your leg is almost gone, your arm and hands are almost gone too. "GAH!! WHATS HAPPENING TO ME!!" You felt like your head is gonna explode any moment. You almost near the light and suddenly theres a shape human, it was your mother and father. "MOM DAD!! HELP ME!! PLEASE....HELP!!" you try to reach as you can. You don't want to die or disappear. Your both parent reach you back too but...

You are summon right back where you met god. You surprise that your alright and also you even more surprise that...you see things. You walk to the gate and touch. "How was it?" god ask you. You turn to the gate. "I-it was...awesome. It's like...it's like your in the time line."

"W-wait! You know Cole, my younger brother. Tell me!! Where is he!!?!!?! Please tell me!!" you worried in frustion. God stand up and said. "I'm not telling you where he is." you begun to mad , but frown. "But I'm going to take you there in one condition, you must pay me in toll."

"O-okay!! Anything you want? You can take my arm, my leg, anything!! Please take me there to my little brother!! He could be in danger!!" you shout at him.

"Relax, I don't want your arm or leg or whatever is your body part. All I need something that I never try before." said God

"L-like what?" you ask confusedly

"Like this" you come toward you, you feel suddenly begun to shrink down to bug size. You hear a "THUD' came from in front of you. God bent down to pick you with index finger and thumb. "W-what happened to me!?! I'm...I'm...I'm shrunk!! WHY DID YOU DO THAT TO ME?!!" "It's againts a law, you know that, right?" he gleaming smile. You pause and stare at him and noded. "That's your punishetment, I did that to your little brother too." he smirk. You begun to tremble your body. Go of Truth stand up

"W-what are you doing?!!" you said squirming in fear.

"I'm taking you to your little brother." God of truth said.

"With this punishment size?!" you said.

"That's correct, why is that?

"It's just scared me, but..."you said

"But what? said the god of truth.

"B-but, what if I everybody can’t pay full attention to me all the time and I could easily end up dead. What if you put me in your shoe and press down too hard? What if s person forget I’m here and mistake me for a bug? It just takes a quick second to stomp out an insignificant bug! What if...it could happen to my little brother?!!" you worried so much.

"Are you that idiot? You have your alchemy, USE IT!!"

"I don't know how!!" you said

"Well, I suggest you should study and practice, and also...you have your father's knife use it too." God of truth smile- W-wait how did he know that you had your father's knife. You were about to speak, but God of Truth interrupted. "You know, I could grow you back, but I could only grow in baby sizes."

"W-wait what?" you siad, but God inturupted.

"Well, no matter, I hope we'll meet again some day, little guy alchemist." You lift you over his mouth. "Oh by the way, you don't have to pretend to not know me. I know you know me from real world." he lick his lip and you gulp. Look likes he got your act. "Down the hatch!!!" he drop you in his mouth as you fall fall on his soft tongue. An a "GULP" you down to his deep dark throat as you scream and scream. God moan and rub his tummy. "That's so good human tastes."

You fall down down down to deep deeper dark though the God's throat. Scream out loud and close eyes and prying to make it stop. You saw a light shines and glow.

You wake up in terrible gasp and sweat. "*huff huff* J-just a terrible dream." you lay down on something soft and comfy. You look around this room, everything in this room is huge and also this isn't your room either. Look likes it wasn't dream. It was real. You begain to notice that your little brother is not here, he could in this house or everywhere outside place to place. It'll take you forever to find him. You were about to get up, the door is open and an person saw you awake. "Oh, your finally awake. I was begain to get worried that you won't wake up." An huge shadow come over you, you look up. You can't believe in your eyes. "It can't be!!" in your thought. Who is this person?

1511.content:
You and Cole both fell from the sky, clouds rushed past the both of you. Despite your best efforts, you found yourself being separated from your brother and carried away by the wind.

"BIG BROTHER!", Cole despertly called out as he was distanced from you.

You felt yourself blacking out as the ground drawer closer. You prayed to any God out there to help you and Cole.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You soon felt yourself coming too. Immediately you noticed the soft and warm ground. Opening your eyes, you saw the ground was peach colored and had the lines that covered a palm. You soon felt the ground shift.

"Oh hey you're awake!", a loud and somewhat familar voice called out.

Looking forward you saw a giant wrist with a blue band. Further up you saw a toned bicep, a pair of large pecs, and the face of Son Goku!

You were in shock. Not only was Goku in front of you, he was a giant! Looking around you noticed finally that you were in his palm. You were smaller then his thumb and for right in the center. You couldn't help but bring your hand to the holder of your life. However a voice suddenly called out to you.

"Nick!"

Widening you eyes, you looked up to see Cole waving at you from atop of Goku's large broad shoulder. Goku chuckled before bringing his other hand up to his shoulder, letting Cole hop on. The Saiyan then lowered the tips of his fingers to the hand holding you, creating a bridge for your brother to cross.

Cole rushed across the palm and embraced you, and you got over your shock and hugged him back.

"Cole....what happened? How...did you..."

Your brother smiled before pointing up at Goku.

"Mr.Goku helped me! He found me and when I said I was lost he offered to help me find you!"

You looked up at the Saiyan, walking out of the embraced you approached the blue wristband. "Go-Mr.Goku, thank you helping me and my brother, I'm very grateful."

Goku gave a big grin while flashing a thumbs up. "No problem! I sensed two energy signatures come out of nowhere. When I investigated, i found your brother laying on a flower. I offered to help find you, and we did!"

Goku brought up a fist to the edge of his palm. Cole laughed and gave a hard fistbump, Goku chuckled in return. He then moved his fist over to you. You very a little perplexed, but looking up at Goku's friendly smile you felt calm and returned the fist bump.

"Haha! Wow you punch hard, I bet you'll win the tournament in one swing!", Goku let out a good laugh and Cole joined in. You found you couldn't resist your laughs either.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You tried to explain the situation the best you could. You left out how Goku was an anime character, rather saying that you and Cole got sucked into a portal and ended up here at this size.

Goku took to the story and offered to let them stay with him intill they could figure how to return them to their world.

You and Cole sat in the center of Goku's palm as he closed his fist around the both of you, to secure you for the flight back. As Goku flew, a little light poured into the warm and dark fist. Cole leaned against you as you rubbed his back.

"Do you think we'll be safe?", your brother asked. You smiled and ruffled his hair.

"Yeah. Don't you remember, Goku helps protect earth. He saves planets and defeat bad guys."

"....He reminds me of dad."

You sighed out. Much like your father, Goku smiled and laughed with them. He helped you and Cole when there was trouble. He even fistbumped and then gave a hearty laugh afterwards.

"Yeah....he is.", looking down you saw Cole had fallen asleep. You smiled before laying down on the soft palm and let sleep consume you.

Goku soon landed outside his house. As he opened his hand he saw you and Cole huddled up together fast asleep. The Saiyan smiled at the both of you before walking over to a hill and laying down. He then gently placed you and Cole on his right pectoral before putting his arms behind his head.

Goku saw the brotherly bond you had. He felt a connection to the two boys and could sense some sort of sadness in you both. Frowning, Goku gently used his finger to rub the top of the brothers heads.

"Don't worry Nick and Cole. I promise I'll protect you, and no danger will come to you as long as I'm around.", smiling Goku looked out at the setting sun and felt sleep affect him as well.


Soon the morning came and......
1511.title: Goku

info.description:
Name:Nick(You)
you 16 year, dark blond hair short brushed down, 5 foot 2, big funky jean pants ripped, you have your father's sharp knife, and you hated everyone said about your parents, but bragging like your father and also you hate carrot.



Name:Cole(your little brother)
Your 11 year little brother, have blond wavy hair, is is 3 foot 4, big dark blue sweater and big shirts, shy and kind had mother neckless, but always nagging you just like your mother.



Rules.

1.Theres no girl allow in this story. Male/Male onely. Unless theres a background.

2.There'll be OCs with bad guy or good guy.

3. PLEASE ADD!!!

4.Allowed: toture, spanks, feet, butt, cock, armpit, mouth, huge humiliated, change hearted, kind, gay love, rage, and revanges or payback

5.Not allowed:toilet, pee, boo, gross. TOO GROSS!! EW!!

6.This starts out as a shrinking story, but can also become a growing story. You or your/and an anime character may grow or shrink.

7.Don’t make a sudden ending. But, only Ocs's death not you and anime characters.

8.Don’t spam. Spam includes nonsense writing and stopping a storyline because you claim it “doesn’t make sense”.

9.Practically any sort of interaction is accepted. Go wild.

Sorry, I detele 12 chapters. I know, I work so hard!! But don't worry, I retpying later and think of something!!
